# Experiment `i`

```{r, echo=F}
library(stringr)
library(anytime)
library(ggplot2)

boiler_temps <- read.csv("./experiment-i.csv")

boiler_temps$time <- anytime(as.numeric(str_replace(boiler_temps$time, "s", "")))
boiler_temps$is_heating <- ifelse(boiler_temps$is_heating == "true", 97, NA)
```


```{r, echo=F}
ggplot(data = boiler_temps, aes(x = time)) +
    geom_line(aes(y = boiler_thermocouple), colour = "blue") +
    geom_line(aes(y = controller), colour = "black") +
    geom_line(aes(y = is_heating), colour = "red")
```
